title: Grill of Victory
overview: Hardcore home cooks with a passion for barbecue face off to prove their skills for a chance to win the ultimate backyard kitchen of their dreams on the all-new series, Grill of Victory. Sabin Lomac challenges three meat masters to battle it out in three fierce rounds of grilling challenges. A rotating panel of judges including, Susie Bulloch, Darnell Ferguson, Tregaye Fraser, and Christian Petroni will help determine who grilled their way to the top to win a brand new custom outdoor kitchen.
